statements: SELECT product_id, test_date, test_result FROM quality_control_test_results;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_test_results;
SELECT test_result, test_date, product_id FROM quality_control_test_results;
SELECT product_id FROM quality_control_test_results WHERE test_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_result FROM quality_control_test_results WHERE product_id = 12345 AND test_result = 'pass';
SELECT test_date, product_id, test_result FROM quality_control_test_results WHERE test_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY test_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, test_result, test_date FROM quality_control_test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY product_id ASC, test_date DESC
SELECT * FROM quality_control_test_results WHERE test_result = 'Failed' ORDER BY product_id DESC, test_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, test_date, test_result FROM quality_control_test_results ORDER BY test_result, product_id DESC, test_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT test_result, test_date, product_id FROM quality_control_test_results WHERE test_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY product_id DESC, test_date DESC
SELECT * FROM QualityControlTests
SELECT test_id, product_name FROM QualityControlTests WHERE test_result = true
SELECT product_name, test_result FROM QualityControlTests ORDER BY test_id DESC
SELECT product_name, test_result FROM QualityControlTests WHERE product_name = 'Product A'
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) FROM QualityControlTests GROUP BY product_name
SELECT * FROM QualityControlTests WHERE test_result = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, test_result FROM QualityControlTests WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM Products ORDER BY product_type DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QualityControlTests;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) FROM Products GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM ProductQualityTestResults;
SELECT product_id, test_result, test_date FROM ProductQualityTestResults WHERE test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM QualityControlTechnicians WHERE technician_department = 'Quality Control';
SELECT technician_id, technician_name FROM QualityControlTechnicians;
SELECT * FROM ProductQualityTestResults;
SELECT test_id, product_id, test_date FROM ProductQualityTestResults WHERE test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT technician_id, technician_name FROM QualityControlTechnicians WHERE technician_department = 'QA' ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(test_date) AS latest_test_date, MIN(test_date) AS oldest_test_date FROM ProductQualityTestResults;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 100;
SELECT id, name FROM Product ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TestResult WHERE result='Pass';
SELECT test_name, test_value FROM TestDetails WHERE test_result_id=1;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM Product WHERE manufacturing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT p.name, td.test_name, td.test_value FROM Product p JOIN TestResult tr ON p.id = tr.product_id JOIN TestDetails td ON tr.id = td.test_result_id WHERE p.price < 500 AND td.test_value = 'Passed';

SELECT tr.test_date, td.test_name, tl.min_value, tl.max_value FROM TestResult tr JOIN TestDetails td ON tr.id = td.test_result_id JOIN TestLimits tl ON td.test_name = tl.test_name WHERE tr.test_date > '2022-07-01';

SELECT p.name AS product_name, tr.test_date AS testing_date, tl.min_value AS min_limit, tl.max_value AS max_limit FROM Product p JOIN TestResult tr ON p.id = tr.product_id JOIN TestDetails td ON tr.id = td.test_result_id JOIN TestLimits tl ON td.test_name = tl.test_name WHERE tl.min_value < 10 AND tl.max_value > 50 ORDER BY tr.test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT engineer_name, engineer_email FROM test_engineers ORDER BY engineer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, test_result FROM products JOIN test_results ON products.product_id = test_results.product_id WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM test_methods ORDER BY method_name DESC;
SELECT engineer_name, engineer_email FROM test_engineers WHERE engineer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY engineer_name ASC;
